Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is often wrong when it comes to literature and spellchecking, as well as cutting out words to hit word count. I believe it can be used as a wrong idea of improvement, but teacher feedback is often tailored to the assignment and is what you will be marked on. i much easier take on feedback from teachers as i trust them.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I feel as if Teacher feedback feels personal, where AI typically feels as if it hasnt read the prompt and understood it, instead provide general and blanket statements.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI doesnt know the rubric, therefore it can be used as a general direction for assistance, but is not to be trusted when it comes to the details, unlike a teacher.
